description:
Refuel with this hearty Southwestern style skillet loaded with beef, beans, sweet potatoes, and sweet corn

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: precooked rice, black beans, cooked beef (beef, salt), dehydrated sweet potatoes, sweet corn, tomato powder, tomato flakes, sea salt, red and green bell peppers, cumin, onion, seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), crystalized lime (citric acid, lime oil, lime juice), dried garlic, Monterey-style chili powder (chili pepper, spices, salt, garlic), dried jalapeno pepper, oregano
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Santa Fe Beef Skillet
